snippet: A fisherman from El Salvador who says he spent 13 months adrift in the Pacific Ocean, surviving on turtle blood and fish and birds caught with his bare hands, vowed he would not venture back out to sea as he left hospital on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: El Salvador Castaway Vows Will Not Return to Sea
headline.main: El Salvador Castaway Vows Will Not Return to Sea

lead_paragraph: A fisherman from El Salvador who says he spent 13 months adrift in the Pacific Ocean, surviving on turtle blood and fish and birds caught with his bare hands, vowed he would not venture back out to sea as he left hospital on Tuesday.
